title: Pixel 3 + Android 10 = no user profile?
content: I had multiple user profiles in Android Pie on Pixel 3, just upgraded my Pixel 3 to Android 10, could not find previous user profiles anymore. The profile switch button just disappears and there is no user setting in the settings options. This feature is important to me. Where is this feature in Android 10 now?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
